Text:
Why does he have to speak English if you're allowed to speak Neanderthal?

Well, I guess one difference would be that theoretically, he could learn to speak English. Whereas clearly you're not able to learn anything.

iPlunder?  You're a classic fucking dickhead.  Sit down and shut the fuck up, you silly-ass motherfucker.

To the rest ... the translation:

"is an auditory training program suitable for all who want to sharpen your ear"

Oh QBall70, you're opinion means soooooooo much to me.

NOT!

What a clever retort. 

And iPlunder, just to help you with your comprehension, given that you clearly need all the help you can get: that was sarcasm. You're obviously a moron on many levels.
